articles.title: LIGO Detects Most Massive Black Hole Merger to Date - Caltech
articles.description: Gravitational waves from massive black holes challenge current astrophysical models
articles.content: The LIGO-Virgo-KAGRA (LVK) Collaboration has detected the merger of the most massive black holes ever observed with gravitational waves using the US National Science Foundation (NSF)-funded LIGO obse… [+6184 chars]
